fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align
Class CharByCharTextLocator

java.lang.Object
  fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align.CharByCharTextLocator

public class CharByCharTextLocator
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to provide detailed information in error messages about the position where an error happens. It simply handles different indexes about the position when reading a text from any object, it does not deal with the reading itself. TODO There may exist standard objects with this kind of behaviour: to check.

Author:
erwan

Parameters:
lineNo - init line number (usually 0)
colNo - init column number (usually 1)
charPosition - init position (counting chars, usually -1)
